name: Equalizer
introduce: Equalizer Exchange is a DEX that uses a vote escrowed model to drive Liquidity to the highest volume pairs. Equalizer's twin-AMM design unites StableSwap pools with Standard 'kxy' liquidity pools. All the trading fees go to Vote-Escrowers of emission token $EQUAL which has to be Locked to earn triple 'Bribes' from candidate pools via Trade Fee, Internal Bribes & External Bribes.
